comments:
The context page of the task editor is blank when a task is active.  It should show the context for the active task.

-- Error Log --

Created an attachment (id=71935)
Context Page Patch

The problem was that the creation of the RemoveFromContextAction was commented out.  Removing this comment seems to have fixed the problem
Thanks for pointing this out. Action removed completely as it is now contributed in plugin.xml
